DOC.brief_summary: To investigate if the use of perioperative neuraxial blockade reduces post-operative mortality and cardiorespiratory events compared to intraoperative general anesthesia AND postoperative IV narcotic analgesia. This is a feasibility study to determine if recruitment and execution of the protocol could be done in a timely manner in a much larger trial
DOC.criteria: Subjects at high risk of cardiorespiratory complications post operatively. Contraindication to epidural anesthesia
